item.description:
Hi last minute notice few of us will be headed over to Whippers tonight, some dancing and social time any one want to join this is an informational release,lol,,dinners two for 20.00 specials, after 7:30 belive there is a small cover charge 7.00. They have darts and a pool table in the back room where you might find me and Carol before the band starts. I will do my best to introduce you prior to the band after that I will be out on the dance floor, this is an exceptionally talented eclectic band.

 

Band: Souled Out Show Band
item.name: Dancing live band "Souled Out Showband"
